page.title: 14THE PEACE MOVEMENT IN LEWES
page.content: The{Peace Movement}is an important part of the lives of many people in Lewes, expressing their concern for the future of the world. Lewes{Campaign for Nuclear Disar- {mament}has attracted 550 members since its l98l formation. With Youth CND, it has members of all ages, from all main opposition parties. They have held many demonstrations and vigils, and their street ballots show that many people think about disarmament even if they do not believe in unilateralism. {"Lewes Against Trident"}is opposed specifically to Britain's expensive nuclear missile. {Lewes World Disarmament Campaign is a multilateralist peace group. The{Lewes Peace Library}in the Friends Meeting House, has books, posters, games and teaching materials about both conflict and Peace.
